events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department due to your software development experience and skills.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to handle your application and will guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your profile has passed the initial screening phase. We are impressed by your previous software engineering projects and technical skills.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your availability for the technical interview. We look forward to further discussions.
Your technical interview with our engineering team has been scheduled for May 10th at 14:00 UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The engineering panel appreciated your problem-solving approach and coding skills.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 15th at 10:00 UTC. This is the last step before we finalize the hiring decision.
You have completed the HR interview successfully. We appreciate your enthusiasm and cultural fit with our company values.
We are pleased to offer you the position of Software Engineer with a competitive salary and benefits package. Please review and respond at your earliest convenience.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. You expressed excitement about joining the engineering team and your eagerness to contribute.
You have accepted the offer. We are excited to welcome you onboard as a new member of our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has started. You will receive information about orientation, tools access, and team introductions soon.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We are thrilled to have you as part of our software engineering team.
